column4: hello all ---its me again...I hadnt gotten an answer to my question which was...."Can one install a package into a live cd that will provide the same fuctionality as knoppix with regards to being able to preset a file name to use as a swap space on an available partition that has free space wether it be ntfs ext2 ext3 or swap?"
secondly is there a live cd mailing list for ubuntu?
I think thats set with boot options, not once you have booted the system
